pr_title: Re-evaluate automatic results of programming exercises

timeline.message: Add database query for participations with latest automatic results
Add corresponding method in participation service
Allow updating all latest automatic results from the latest tests cases
Set the completion date when updating a result
Add REST endpoint for re-evaluating programming exercises
Improve code style and fix bug

timeline.bodyText:
do we really need the part or result is null?
We cannot update a non existing result so we don't even need to fetch it from the database right?
timeline.author: krusche
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -68,6 +69,16 @@
     @Query("select distinct participation from StudentParticipation participation left join fetch participation.results result where participation.exercise.id = :#{#exerciseId} and (result.id = (select max(id) from participation.results) or result is null)")
     List<StudentParticipation> findByExerciseIdWithLatestResult(@Param("exerciseId") Long exerciseId);
 
+    /**
+     * Get all participations for an exercise with each latest {@link AssessmentType#AUTOMATIC} result (determined by id).
+     * If there is no latest result (= no result at all), the participation will still be included in the returned ResultSet, but will have an empty Result array.
+     *
+     * @param exerciseId Exercise id.
+     * @return participations for exercise.
+     */
+    @Query("select distinct participation from StudentParticipation participation left join fetch participation.results result where participation.exercise.id = :#{#exerciseId} and (result.id = (select max(prs.id) from participation.results prs where prs.assessmentType = 'AUTOMATIC') or result is null)")

replies.bodyText: I adapted that from the query above, but I guess we can also leave it out.
replies.author: MaisiKoleni

replies.bodyText: I would leave it out for performance reasons. Or is typically not performant and we would filter those participations out later anyway
replies.author: krusche

timeline.bodyText:
should we update the templateParticipation and the solutionParticipation as well?
While they should have 0% and 100% anyway, this is not always the case, so I guess this would make sense.
Especially when there is a bonus, the solution result might change (e.g. from 100% to 125%)
timeline.author: krusche

replies.bodyText: Template and solution are now updated as well.
replies.author: MaisiKoleni

timeline.message: Add client side rest call to service
Change query to only include participations with automatic result
Update template and solution as well
Fix missing results for template and solution
Revert update the completion date because it messes the latest result up
Add feedbacks to database query and rename method
Set score to zero if there are test cases and no test passes
fix disable logic in client and nullpointer exception for Boolean unwrap
make sure the default value for bonus points is stored in the database
